name: Dragon's Lair 3: The Curse of Mordread
name_original: Dragon's Lair 3: The Curse of Mordread
description:
Dragon's Lair 3: The Curse of Mordread is an arcade game developed by Don Bluth Multimedia. It was originally released in 1992. It was published by ReadySoft.
Dragon's Lair 3: The Curse of Mordread is available on PC.
